trans-unit.source: How to: Put a Value in a Property (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 如何︰ 将值放属性 (Visual Basic 中) |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: How to: Put a Value in a Property (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 如何：在属性中放置值 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: You store a value in a property by putting the property name on the left side of an assignment statement.
trans-unit.target: 通过将属性名称放在赋值语句的左侧，可以在属性中存储一个值。

trans-unit.source: The property's `Set` procedure stores a value, but you do not explicitly call it by name.
trans-unit.target: 该属性的`Set`过程存储一个值，但并不按名称显式调用它。

trans-unit.source: You use the property just as you would use a variable.
trans-unit.target: 就像您使用一个变量，您可以使用该属性。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] makes the calls to the property's procedures.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]调用该属性的过程。

trans-unit.source: To store a value in a property
trans-unit.target: 在属性中存储的值

trans-unit.source: Use the property name on the left side of an assignment statement.
trans-unit.target: 在赋值语句左侧使用的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the value of the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] `TimeOfDay` property to noon, implicitly calling its `Set` procedure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置的值[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]`TimeOfDay`属性设置为中午，隐式调用其`Set`过程。

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[VbVbcnProcedures#11](./codesnippet/VisualBasic/how-to-put-a-value-in-a-property_1.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[VbVbcnProcedures #&11;](./codesnippet/VisualBasic/how-to-put-a-value-in-a-property_1.vb)]

trans-unit.source: If the property takes arguments, follow the property name with parentheses to enclose the argument list.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性接受参数，请按照用括号括起的参数列表的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: If there are no arguments, you can optionally omit the parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 如果不有任何参数，可以选择省略括号。

trans-unit.source: Place the arguments in the argument list within the parentheses, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 将参数放在括号内，用逗号分隔参数列表中。

trans-unit.source: Be sure you supply the arguments in the same order that the property defines the corresponding parameters.
trans-unit.target: 请确保您的属性定义的相应参数的相同顺序的参数提供。

trans-unit.source: The value generated on the right side of the assignment statement is stored in the property.
trans-unit.target: 生成的赋值语句右侧的值存储在该属性。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.DateAndTime.TimeOfDay%2A></xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.DateAndTime.TimeOfDay%2A>
